title: Add integration tests for full handoff flows
description:
Test complete agent → human → agent workflows:

```go
func TestEngine_FullHandoffFlow_ApprovalNeeded(t *testing.T) {
    // Setup: Epic with one task
    mock := newMockTicksClient()
    mock.addTask("task1", "Do security work")
    
    agent := newMockAgent()
    agent.queueResponse("Done! <promise>APPROVAL_NEEDED: security change</promise>")
    
    engine := NewEngine(mock, agent)
    
    // Act: Run engine
    err := engine.Run("epic1")
    
    // Assert: Task awaiting, not closed
    assert.NoError(t, err)
    assert.Equal(t, "approval", mock.awaitingState["task1"])
    assert.False(t, mock.closedTasks["task1"])
    
    // Simulate human approval
    mock.SetVerdict("task1", "approved", "")
    
    // Assert: Now closed
    assert.True(t, mock.closedTasks["task1"])
}

func TestEngine_FullHandoffFlow_RejectionLoop(t *testing.T) {
    // Test: Agent → Human rejects → Agent retries with feedback
    mock := newMockTicksClient()
    mock.addTask("task1", "Write error messages")
    
    agent := newMockAgent()
    agent.queueResponse("Done! <promise>CONTENT_REVIEW: error messages</promise>")
    agent.queueResponse("Fixed! <promise>COMPLETE</promise>")  // After feedback
    
    engine := NewEngine(mock, agent)
    
    // First run: hands off
    engine.Run("epic1")
    assert.Equal(t, "content", mock.awaitingState["task1"])
    
    // Human rejects
    mock.SetVerdict("task1", "rejected", "Too harsh, soften tone")
    
    // Second run: agent sees feedback, completes
    engine.Run("epic1")
    assert.True(t, mock.closedTasks["task1"])
    assert.Contains(t, agent.lastContext, "Too harsh")
}
```

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] Full approval flow tested
- [ ] Full rejection/retry flow tested  
- [ ] Human feedback passed to agent
- [ ] Multiple handoffs in same task tested
- [ ] Pre-declared requires field tested
